Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

	We are seeking a detail-oriented, accurate, and proactive Data Entry Officer to join our operations team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for entering, maintaining, and verifying company data across multiple systems, supporting decision-making and efficient workflow management.
	This role requires a high level of accuracy, organization, and commitment to confidentiality.


Responsibilities


	Input, update, and maintain accurate records in company databases and spreadsheets.
	Review data for errors or discrepancies and correct any identified issues.
	Support operations, logistics, and inventory departments by ensuring timely data updates.
	Generate daily, weekly, and monthly reports as required.
	Cross-check source documents for accuracy before data entry.
	Maintain strict confidentiality of all company and client information.
	Assist with administrative and clerical tasks as assigned.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND / HND / Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in any relevant field.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, Word, and Google/Zoho Workspace tools.
	Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
	Excellent typing speed and data management skills.
	Good communication and organizational abilities.
	Ability to work with minimal supervision and meet tight deadlines.
	Prior experience in a data entry or administrative support role is an advantage.


Personal Attributes:


	Reliable and consistent.
	Highly organized and analytical.
	Team-oriented with strong self-discipline.
	Eager to learn and improve efficiency.


Compensation &amp; Benefits


	Competitive salary based on experience.
	Opportunities for career growth within the company.
	Supportive and innovative work environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;

	Input, update, and maintain accurate records in company databases and spreadsheets.
	Review data for errors or discrepancies and correct any identified issues.
	Support operations, logistics, and inventory departments by ensuring timely data updates.

	Maintain strict confidentiality of all company and client information.
	Assist with administrative and clerical tasks as assigned.

	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, Word, and Google/Zoho Workspace tools.

	Good communication and organizational abilities.
	Ability to work with minimal supervision and meet tight deadlines.

	Reliable and consistent.

	Team-oriented with strong self-discipline.
	Eager to learn and improve efficiency.

	Competitive salary based on experience.
